full_summary:
**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) - Building Conditions Report**

**Reference Number:** WS3688211169
**Publication Date:** October 11, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** November 29, 2022 at 14:00 EST

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is inviting architectural and engineering firms with the expertise and experience to submit a proposal for a potential Standing Offer agreement to develop Building Conditions Reports. This procurement will follow a one-phase submission process, and the selected consultants will provide a range of services as identified in the Request for Standing Offer.

**Required Services:**

* Development of Building Conditions Reports for deliverables within the National Capital Region (NCR)
* Services will be provided in accordance with the standards and guidelines set forth in the Request for Standing Offer

**Eligibility Criteria:**

* Firms must be licensed or eligible to be licensed to practice in the province of Quebec and Ontario
* Firms licensed to practice in only one province must be eligible and willing to be licensed in the other province

**Submission Requirements:**

* Firms and individuals must submit their proposal through the Government of Canada Electronic Tendering Services
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada

**Notice of Amendment:**

* The closing time for submission has been amended to November 29, 2022 at 14:00 EST
* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the new closing time
* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive

**Trade Agreements:**

* This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

For more information, please visit the [Ariba Discovery](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/142
